meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or disapproval.
meanings.sent2: Foh! I can't believe you said that.
meanings.sent3: Foh! Did you really think that was a good idea?

meanings.definition: A sound made to drive away animals.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a loud foh to scare off the birds.
meanings.sent2: I heard a foh coming from the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The foh echoed through the forest, scaring the rabbits.
meanings.sent4: The foh was so effective that the squirrels ran away quickly.
meanings.sent5: The foh was like a warning signal to the animals.

meanings.definition: A term used in the restaurant industry to refer to the front of house staff.
meanings.sent1: The foh team greeted the customers with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The foh manager ensured the tables were set perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The foh crew worked efficiently to serve the guests.
meanings.sent4: The foh staff handled reservations and seating arrangements.
meanings.sent5: The foh employees were the face of the restaurant.
